TopicTitle: Game crash when trying to return to base.

Articles.Content:
Hello, I have encountered a consistent game-crashing issue. Whenever I try to return from a landed vehicle on Minmus (Staging screen) back to base on Kerbin via the pause menu "Space Centre" the game crashes to desktop. Here is a screenshot taken moments before 'doom' (http://www./view/qrdtbgcngg768qr/2015-07-19_00001.jpg). Also, the two latest crash reports (https://www./folder/r66nh0b862n6z/2015-07-19_172818) (https://www./folder/6c3k388foau8m/2015-07-19_181710) and the save game file (http://www./download/owy15xz5txjb5fo/IKSS_13.sfs). If I forgot something, or there is anything else you may require of me please inform me.

Thank you for your support.

KSP Ver. 1.0.4.861 (Steam)

OS: Windows 7 (64-bit)

CPU: Intel i7-3632QM

RAM: 8.00GB (7.86 Usable)

GPU: GeForce 640M LE

http://imgur.com/a/spLAs#0

Above is me testing your save game.

I had some trouble landing the rover in one piece, the thrust was not evenly distributed. None the less, I was then able to successfully go to the space station.

I am not sure what you are experiencing.

As I was told on a previous post, upload your output_log located in the KSP_data Directory. This can help some others figure out what is wrong or may be causing an issue.

Cheers and I hope it gets sorted out for you.
